Tigerit.name: HRM
Tigerit.description: optimizing the entire employee lifecycle within an organization. It includes functions such as recruitment, onboarding, training, performance management, and employee relations, aiming to cultivate a positive work environment, maximize employee potential, and align organizational goals with workforce capabilitie
title: UI Develop
Human Management System
subtitle: HRM
management
Infomration

workido.title: Features Break Down
subtitle: Maintain a centralized database with detailed profiles of each employee, including personal details, contact information, and job history
Implement a system for tracking employee attendance, including clock-in/out times, leave requests, and absence notifications
Allow employees to request, manage, and track their leave balances, and enable managers to approve or reject leave requests
Conduct performance reviews and appraisals, allowing managers to provide feedback, set goals, and document employee achievements
Manage the entire recruitment process, from posting job vacancies to onboarding new hires, including document verification and orientation
Implement a system for tracking work hours, breaks, and overtime to ensure accurate and compliant timekeeping
Automate payroll processes, calculate salaries, manage deductions, and generate pay stubs for accurate and timely payroll processing
Provide a self-service portal for employees to access personal information, submit requests, and view company policies
Generate reports and analytics on various HR metrics, such as turnover rates, employee performance, and diversity statistics.
Training and Development
